General.Name: Snow Lake Resources Ltd
General.Description: Snow Lake Resources Ltd., a natural resource exploration company, engages in the exploration and development of mineral resources in Canada. It explores for uranium and lithium mineral resources. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Winnipeg, Canada.
General.Address: 360 Main Street, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R3C 0V1
